Articles.Content: When in the VAB, attempt to load a vehicle. It loads and immediatly seems to go into the floor of the VAB. It then subsequently disappears enterly.

I've also had this happen several times; it appears to be due to corrupted vehicle save files. I'm not sure what causes certain vehicles to corrupt on save, but once they do you basically have to start over.
Similar to what I got too, did a Similar Bug Report if this helps anyone.
Anyone know if this has been fixed yet? Now my KSP 2 wont load so I dont know

It was fixed. Original problem was putting symmetry on symmetry, i.e. putting 4 chutes on a tank that had been attached with a sym of 4. 

In the patch notes they mention fixing both the "sym on sym" bug and the "VAB floor bug" maybe just to clear it up for folks who knew it as either.

Anyway, no more floor, I had several craft it had affected, they're all good now.
